setup:
Supply and demand in a market are defined by the following equations: $$\begin{align} q_d &= 10p^{-1} \\ q_s &= \frac{1}{5}p \end{align}$$

1. Calculate the equilibrium price.

2. Calculate the equilibrium quantity.
